entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 21 April 2023
